item.title: Video Games Guide: Best £60–£89 Buys & Deals UK Now
item.description:
Video Games: What to look for before you buy (and three smart buys in the £60–£89 range)

If you want to buy video games or related gear in the UK and get good value, know what to check before you click. This guide covers practical checks, care tips and three specific listings on eBay UK in the £60–£89 band — two Valve Index “Knuckle” controllers and a well-regarded board game — so you can buy video games, controllers and tabletop experiences with confidence.
